description.en: One day, Haruto Akihara, a high school student living alone, moves in with his classmate Rei Mikoto, an extremely beautiful girl! Rei, nicknamed the "Goddess of Ice", has a cold attitude towards Haruto, who is devoted to her, but gradually...?
description.ja: 一人暮らしの高校生・秋原晴人はある日、同級生の超美少女・水琴玲衣と同棲することに!!「氷の女神」の異名を持つ玲衣は冷たい態度をとるが、献身的に接する晴人に段々とベタ甘でポンコツに…!?

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

description.en:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

altTitles.ja: 水属性の魔法使い

description.en:
Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world, Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time, but it’s enough to eke out a comfortable existence — or so he thought.

The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack, a single knife, some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and there’s nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else, but he’s ready to take bulls, boars, and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself.

Each new victory brings a new challenge, but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman, a dragon, and a castaway swordsman have in common? They’re the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen — one adventure at a time.
Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.
description.pt-br: Kwon Yong-jin, um protagonista que não acredita em superstições, experiencia eventos inacreditáveis logo após seu 16º aniversário.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.th: โอตาคุน่องเหล็ก

altTitles.ja: 弱虫ペダル

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

description.en:
Raniel Van Trias, the Ashen Wizard, is a highly skilled mage set on defeating the Demon King. After years of fighting alongside the renowned Hero's Party and multiple encounters with the Demon King, he is ousted from the party, left with a curse on his heart, forced to lose half his lifespan, and transformed into a woman! 

Undeterred, Raniel becomes an assistant professor at the Royal Apelia Academy as Rania and searches for a way to lift the curse, oblivious to how challenging his task may be...

description.ko:
마왕을 무찌르고 세상을 구원하기 위해 모인 최강의 용사파티가 있었다.

하지만 마왕 토벌엔 관심이 없고편한 전장만 찾는 용사 파티에 환멸을 느낀 잿빛 마법사 라니엘은,결국 파티를 때려치우고 고향으로 돌아와 스승을 만난다.그런 그에게 라니엘의 스승인 로셀은명문 아카데미, 아플리아의 조교수 자리를 권하게 된다.

"아니, 이걸 왜 못하지?"
"그냥 회로 생성하고 쓰면 되는데?"

하지만 세계관 최강자도 막상 가르침에는 소질이 없는 듯 한데...

어찌저찌 아플리아 아카데미에 취직하게 된 인류 최강 전력.먼치킨 마법사의 좌충우돌 아카데미 조교수기가 시작된다!

Is It The Bully's Fault Or The Bullied Me's Fault?

altTitles.vi: Kẻ bắt nạt với kẻ bị bắt nạt, ai mới là người có lỗi?

description.en: Aizawa was bullied by Suzuki to the point of becoming truant. He picks himself back up and becomes a teacher. 20 years later, his bully's daughter is one of his students and she's being harassed in class, a secret she keeps from her father.
description.pt-br: Aizawa sofria bullying de Suzuki a ponto de abandonar a escola. Ele se recompõe e se torna um professor. 20 anos depois, a filha de seu valentão é uma de suas alunas e está sendo alvo de bullying na sua sala, segredo que guarda de seu pai que tanto a ama, que vê as vítimas como culpadas.

altTitles.ja: アキラ

description.en: Welcome to Neo-Tokyo, built on the ashes of a Tokyo annihilated by a blast of unknown origin that triggered World War III. The lives of two streetwise teenage friends, Tetsuo and Kaneda, change forever when paranormal abilities begin to waken in Tetsuo, making him a target for a shadowy agency that will stop at nothing to prevent another catastrophe like the one that leveled Tokyo. At the core of the agency's motivation is a raw, all-consuming fear of an unthinkable, monstrous power known only as Akira.
description.vi:
Akira lấy bối cảnh ở Neo-Tokyo sau tận thế vào năm 2030, một đô thị rộng lớn được xây dựng trên đống tro tàn của một Tokyo bị hủy diệt bởi một vụ nổ khải huyền có sức mạnh huyền bí đã gây ra Thế chiến III. 
Cuộc sống của hai người bạn tuổi teen Tetsuo và Kaneda trên đường phố Neo-Tokyo đã thay đổi mãi mãi khi những khả năng siêu nhiên bí ẩn bắt đầu thức tỉnh bên trong Tetsuo, người mà trở thành mục tiêu cho một hoạt động mờ ám của chính phủ và một tổ chức sẽ không bao giờ dừng lại trước bất cứ điều gì để ngăn chặn một thảm họa khác giống như thảm họa đã san phẳng Tokyo. Cốt lõi động lực của cơ quan này là nỗi sợ hãi thô sơ, ám ảnh về một sức mạnh quái dị không thể tưởng tượng được chỉ được biết đến với cái tên AKIRA

description.en: In high society, Raven is known as a womanizer and a free spirit. But suddenly, Estella, who’s rumored to hate men and is said to be the cruelest girl in the empire, walks into his bachelor life. And this girl proposes that he marry her! “There’s not a chance in hell this marriage will succeed,” thinks the young guy. But... Estella is convinced he’ll be the one to fall head over heels for her. How will it all pan out, and in the end, who will be right...
A geometry project I made back in high school.

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.ja:
「嫌い」な彼女に負けるたび、曝け出されるホントの気持ち――。

吉沢わかばの幼馴染、梅園小牧。彼女は、品行方正で才色兼備な優等生の仮面を被った、人を見下す性悪女だった。そんな小牧に奪われた尊厳を取り戻すため、彼女に勝負を挑むわかばだったが、「私が勝ったらわかばの大事なものを一つずつ奪う」という条件をつけられて――!?ファーストキスに始まり、一つ一つ「尊厳」を奪われていく中で、小牧に抱く気持ちが「嫌い」だけでないことに気付きーー？
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

title.en: A Story About an Atenean Girl at Blackbox

description.en: A oneshot adapted from a college page shitpost.

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: 陽だまりのオレンジ

description.fr: Nanami, un lycéen de première année, est sur la bonne voie pour passer des examens supplémentaires en raison de ses mauvaises notes. Dans la salle de préparation artistique de l'école, il rencontre Takanashi - un grand aîné qui s'est classé 3e aux tests simulés au niveau national - et le supplie et l'oblige à l'aider dans ses études.Une personne attirante avec le genre d'aura qui le rend inaccessible. Cependant, Nanami est attiré par son côté doux et compatissant et le sourire de senpai montre rarement quelqu'un. –––Mais cette relation a une échéance. Et Nanami, désireux d'en savoir plus sur senpai, va… ?

altTitles.ja: ふたりソロキャンプ

description.en:
Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin.

**Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.

The series resumed its publication in December 2023.
description.es: A Kinokura Gen le encanta acampar solo. Disfruta de la tranquila soledad lejos del ajetreo de la ciudad, y de ser capaz de apreciar la naturaleza por sí mismo. Pero en un viaje de campamento, su soledad se ve interrumpida por la aparición de Kusano Shizuku, una joven que quería ir sola a acampar, pero está mal preparada y completamente fuera de su alcance. Mientras él intenta que ella regrese a casa para poder acampar en paz, ella se niega, y tercamente insiste en acompañarlo en futuros viajes de campamento hasta que esté lista para acampar sola. Así comienzan los días en que Gen y Shizuku acampan juntos…
description.ja: オレは樹乃倉厳。34歳。趣味はキャンプ。独りで野営する生粋のソロキャンパー。車はいらない。電車を乗り継ぎ、最後はバスで山に入る。自然を愛してる、火を木を水を土を。それと同等に孤独な自分の生き方を愛している――。…な俺が！　ひょんなことから草野雫20歳という小娘に出会い、ふたりでソロキャンプをするはめに！

altTitles.ja: 凪がれ星

description.en:
Tensei is a college student who’s a hobbyist photographer. One day while taking photos, he encounters and becomes captivated by a boy with burn scars on his face, Makito. 

Worn down by people staring at his scars from an accident, Makito escaped the flashy modelling industry and instead found work at a small-town library. 
Tensei, who knows nothing about this past, comes to talk to Makito whenever he borrows and returns books. He begins to fall in love with Makito’s delicate and beautiful profile, and before he knows it, he’s pointing his camera at him.

He’s hopelessly attracted to the way Makito looks in his photos. But, as he realizes his overwhelming feelings, a guy from Makito’s modelling past shows up to take him back…?

College kid with a photography hobby and a hidden possessive streak X Ex-model with large burn scars on his face

“Even your scars are beautiful. I just want to mess you up…”

The story of a love affair, played out under a sky full of stars.

description.fr:
Avec le cœur tremblant, il s’est présenté au rendez-vous arrangé tout en dissimulant sa véritable identité.

“Voici mon grand-père, mon père, ma mère, mon grand frère et mon oncle !”

Pourquoi, bon sang, tous ces foutus héros sont-ils rassemblés devant moi ?!

Il s’avère que la famille de ma petite amie est une lignée de héros parmi les plus puissants ?!

An Jae-rim, un vilain connu sous le nom de “Exécuteur”, tente de jouer le rôle du gendre parfait tout en cachant sa véritable identité et en essayant de se débarrasser de sa belle-famille. Mais ce n’est pas aussi simple qu’il le pensait !

Pour couronner le tout, ils me prennent pour un aspirant héros alors que je suis un méchant !

Une comédie d’action hilarante pleine de tension et de rebondissements !

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

title.en: Assault Lily: League of Gardens -full bloom-

description.en:
When the enigmatic life-forms called the Huge appeared, they nearly brought the world to ruin. But humanity studied the energy called magie and created CHARMs, potent weapons against the Huge. 

Teenage girls, who proved to resonate the most with CHARMs, became the vanguard in the war with the Huge. There is a name for these girls who fight against humankind's end. They are known as elegant flowers of battle—as Lilies.

A manga adaptation of the stage play "Assault Lily: League of Gardens."

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

---
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67335)
description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

description.th:
เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

---

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

---

意外穿成为了帝国最声名鼎盛的第一家族的私生女。虽然蒂亚头脑出众，也积累了大量的实战经验，但最终在爷爷去世后被叔叔扫地出门，而无能的叔叔很快便败光了家族的产业…… 意外死亡后，又一次重新回了小时候——这一世，蒂亚决定成为家主，重新让家族站上帝国巅峰！

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

---

description.en: In a chaotic Joseon dynasty with vampires, ghosts, and shamans, Park Moon-soo, who calls himself a dark-speaker, destroys a corrupted official. In order to subdue the dark master Park Moon-soo, who is trying to revive the vampire king, the court dispatches Anson, a military officer who has just passed the exam, to find Hong Kil-dong, an outlaw who is good at swordsmanship and martial arts and dispatches him to Taebaek Mountain.
description.ko: 흡혈귀와 요괴, 무당이 창궐한 혼란의 조선, 자신을 암흑어사라 칭하는 박문수가 타락한 관아를 파괴하고 다닌다. 다급해진 조정에서는 흡혈귀 왕의 부활을 노리는 암흑어사 박문수를 토벌하라 명하기 위해 갓 무과에 급제한 무관 안손에게 도술과 무술에 능한 도적 홍킬동을 찾아오라 태백산으로 파견한다. <하이브>의 김규삼 작가가 선사하는 요괴 퇴마 개그 판타지 시대극!

altTitles.ja: 一勝千金

description.en:
"Yup! Just as slow as I thought."

After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...
description.ja:
女子×裏格闘×団体運営＝？？？

格闘団体をクビになった天馬希望（てんまのぞみ）は一攫千金を夢見て、幼なじみの2人と女子だけの裏格闘団体を立ち上げる！しかし、興行を成功させるためスター選手として招き入れたのは、可愛らしい見た目からは想像できないとってもキケンな女子高生で…！？金か？ 夢か？ 革命か？

altTitles.ja: てんで性悪キューピッド

description.en: The Koinobori yakuza family's souls are expensive commodoties, a source of great pride to those of the demon world's soul bank. But when the Koinobori heir, Ryuji, is born with a pure soul engrossed with fairies and angels, it's up to Maria to become his personal cupid and reform him so that he continues the Koinobori's lascivious family line!

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

description.en: Young master Hewlett is a famous work-a-holic watch-maker whose one dream is to make watches only for people who appreciate and love them. And exactly when he thought he’d never meet such a person, his faithful butler Jill made him attend a tea-party where he met the new maid Mulara. And her first words were that her greatest treasure ever is one of master Hewlett’s old watches…

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

altTitles.ja: 刺靑

description.en:
A love story between two souls separated by their stations in life, in the form of a tattoo.

"Even if we stopped seeing each other, my soul would always be with you."

A man visits a certain tatoo artist. A vivid love story of surreptitious, yet intense longing of two souls.
description.ru: Что может быть прекрасней для маленькой девочки, чем экзотическая птица из далекой страны? Может быть, первая любовь? Пройдет несколько лет, и юной девушке не придется выбирать.

altTitles.ja: 顔の無い男

description.en: Separated by war, a pair of lovers seek to be united once more...
description.ru: Сая сбегает из дома для того, чтобы найти своего любимого, который несколько лет назад ушёл на войну и до сих пор так и не вернулся. Сая уверена, что её любимый жив и она сможет его найти. В первом же поселении на Саю нападают бандиты. Что же ей делать? Ведь она совсем одна. И тут её на помощь приходит человек без лица и голоса. Но его глаза ... почему они так до боли знакомы Сае?

description.en: Cutlet Warrior's yuri oneshot collection.
Even after all these years, you’re still the only one I think of… I’ll put all of my feelings into this letter for you.

altTitles.es-la: Una princesa que trabaja duro por su favorito

altTitles.en: The Princess is Secretly a Fan

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m an Imperial Princess, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s honor is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: Hibike! Euphonium - I Scream. / Happy I Scream.(Doujinshi)

description.en: An alternative take on Liz and the Blue Bird. Will Nozomi be able to convey her feelings…?

title.en: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.ja: 売れ残りの奴隷エルフを拾ったので、娘にすることにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Urenokori no Dorei Elf wo Hirotta no de, Musume ni suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.en: My Daughter was an Unsold Slave Elf.

altTitles.vi: Con gái tôi là tiên tộc bán ế

description.en:
Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct.

He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...? 

A warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elven daughter!
description.ja:
絶滅したというエルフの上位種、ハイエルフの少女が売られているのを見つけたヴァイス。

購入して娘として育てることに決めた。言葉も知らないハイエルフだったがヴァイスの懸命な育児の成果がでてきて…？ 

成長が止まらないハイエルフから目が離せないっっ！

altTitles.ja: 赤いくつ

description.en:
A collection of some of the earliest one-shots done by Hideko Mizuno, with shared elements of dance and the fantastical.

- **The Red Shoes** (赤いくつ, Akai Kutsu, story by Chiaki Saeki): The tale of Nais and Ruby, a brother and a sister who face turmoil when tragedy strikes close to home, and the titular pair of red shoes, said to give anyone who wears them flawless dancing ability.
- **Something for Misa** (ミサにあげるもの, Misa ni Ageru Mono)
- **Night of the Blue Star** (青い星の夜, Aoi Hoshi no Yoru): Toshiko, a girl in poverty, has always longed for the pair of red shoes at her local store. On the day of her town's star festival, Toshiko encounters a puppy being harassed by some children. This puppy takes an unusual liking to her... Also collected in *[Starry Fantasy](https://mangadex.org/title/3f0d7f7a-06f1-442a-9326-52dbd6b2c740/starry-fantasy)*.

altTitles.ja: 星降る王国のニナ

altTitles.de: Nina – Die Sterne sind dein Schicksal

description.en: Nina had a rough start to life, stealing to survive—and eventually being sold into slavery by her own brother. But to her surprise, her captor, Prince Azure, ordained that she would live the life of a princess...specifically, that of the recently deceased princess-priestess, Alisha. But despite her changing fortune, Nina won't give up her old life without a fight...and Azure might just be the one to finally match her wits. But how much can she trust Azure? And can she stop the feelings budding in her heart, knowing she must eventually marry another...? [Kodansha]
description.it: Nina è un'orfana che vive nei bassifondi della città con Colin e Saji, due fratelli orfani come lei. La ragazza si finge un maschio e si fa chiamare Ninaf per non essere venduta come schiava a causa del raro colore dei suoi occhi. Nina sopravvive rubando e cerca di prendersi cura dei due fratelli che vivono con lei, soprattutto di Colin che è gravemente malato. In seguito alla sua morte, Nina viene venduta da Saji e acquistata allo scopo di diventare la sostituta di una principessa morta che aveva lo stesso raro colore de suoi occhi. Nina ha tre mesi di tempo per imparare le buone maniere e lo stile di vite di una nobildonna, dato che il suo destino è sposare un principe di un altro paese.
description.ja: 星の神のごとき深き青――瑠璃色の瞳を持つ少女ニナは、その美しき瞳ゆえに、フォルトナ国第二王子、アズール・セス・フォルトナに見出される。三ヶ月後に、大国ガルガダの王位継承権を持つ第一王子のもとに嫁ぐはずだった姫巫女アリシャの身代わりとして。姫として作法を学び、美しく着飾り、大国を欺くことを求められたニナは、運命に翻弄されながら、一生に一度の恋に出会う。

title.en: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka: Familia Chronicle—Episode Freya

altTitles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Chronicle—Episode Freya

altTitles.ru: Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье - Хроники Фреи

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか　ファミリアクロニクル　ｅｐｉｓｏｄｅフレイヤ

description.en:
"Uh…Freya-sama left a letter and has left…"  
  
The members of the Freya Familia all turned at once to look at the messenger. Leaving the shocked first class adventurers aside, the uninhibited Goddess of Beauty leaves on a journey to fulfill her desire!
description.ru:
«Эээ … Фрейя-сама оставила письмо и ушла …»   
  
Члены Семьи Фрейи сразу повернулись, чтобы посмотреть на посланника. Оставив в стороне потрясенных первоклассных авантюристов, раскованная Богиня красоты отправляется в путешествие, чтобы исполнить свое желание!

altTitles.ja: 夜な夜な夜な

description.en: In Hakone, phantom thief Yona and her team of specialists try and recover pieces of art stolen by the corrupt police force.
description.ja: 夜行怪盗団、それは、悪から盗み戻す、正義の盗賊。警察も、政治家も皆、悪に支配された今、苦しめられる人々を救うため！　怪盗・夜名（よな）は醜塊と戦う決意をする。

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.uk: Сусідський ангел сильно мене балує: Бісля дощу

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まり二人は少しずつ惹かれあっていく――。

altTitles.ja: 異世界サムライ

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!
